Update choices, values, selected choices

Functions to update choices, values, and selected choices.

Arguments

id

A character string specifying the id of an input to update.

...

Named values or unnamed values specifying which and how existing or new input choices, values, or which values are selected are updated, values are [dots_list()] allowing the use of bangs and splices.
